com.diffplug.freshmark - package com.diffplug.freshmark
 
CommentScript - Class in com.diffplug.freshmark
A CommentScript is a way of automatically generating or modifying parts of a document by embedding scripts in the comments of that document.

Creates a CommentScript using the given parser to delineate and combine comment blocks.

P

Parser - Class in com.diffplug.freshmark
Parser splits text into tags and body sections, passes pairs of matching sections to a Parser.SectionCompiler, then combines that output with the original document to generate the final output.
Parser() - Constructor for class com.diffplug.freshmark.Parser
 
Parser.ChunkHandler - Interface in com.diffplug.freshmark
Interface for passing a chunk of the document.
Parser.SectionCompiler - Interface in com.diffplug.freshmark
Interface which can compile a single section of a FreshMark document.
ParserIntronExon - Class in com.diffplug.freshmark
A parser defined by "intron" and "extron" chunks of text.
ParserIntronExon(String, String) - Constructor for class com.diffplug.freshmark.ParserIntronExon
A Parser which uses simple intron / exon string to delimit comments.
ParserIntronExon(String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.diffplug.freshmark.ParserIntronExon
A Parser with the given comment intron/exon pair, with a custom regex.
prefixDelimiterReplace(String, String, String, String) - Static method in class com.diffplug.freshmark.FreshMark
Replaces after prefix and before delimiter with replacement.
